body_html:
I installed CUDA 9.1.85 and cudnn 7 for 9.1 and tried

pip3 install tensorflow-1.6.0rc1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl

but still having tensorflow-1.6.0rc1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform. issue.
body_text:
I installed CUDA 9.1.85 and cudnn 7 for 9.1 and tried
pip3 install tensorflow-1.6.0rc1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
but still having tensorflow-1.6.0rc1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform. issue.
body:
I installed CUDA 9.1.85 and cudnn 7 for 9.1 and tried
```bash
pip3 install tensorflow-1.6.0rc1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl
```

but still having **tensorflow-1.6.0rc1-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.** issue.
